rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: This space acts as the main entry point and reception area, featuring an open-plan layout with seamless integration into adjacent spaces. It includes a sitting area that overlooks the garden and is designed to encourage positive energy flow according to Vastu.
features: large glass windows for natural light

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area with an extended seating space designed for family meals and occasional gatherings. It features ample storage and a modern aesthetic.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A fully equipped modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances. Designed with an efficient workflow in mind and a view to the garden.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A guest bathroom positioned conveniently near the living area for visitors, ensuring privacy and ease of access.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace designed with sound insulation and ample natural light. It is positioned in a quiet zone of the ground floor for concentration and productivity.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large entrance door providing access from the garden to the main living area. Designed with both aesthetics and functionality in mind, featuring reinforced glass.

openings.name: Secondary Door
openings.description: Service door for utility and storage access, complementing the main entrance.

openings.name: Window Series
openings.description: Multiple windows installed in the living areas to enhance natural ventilation and illumination, aligning with Vastu principles for energy flow.

openings.name: Balcony Opening
openings.description: A balcony overlooking the garden for outdoor seating and relaxation.
